Description.Name: Pain Shunt Appointment
Description.Details: Tired of feeling every hit, heat spike or neural feedback when you are in your mech? Well then, Manny Dominos has the perfect solution for you: the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePainShunt],Pain Shunt]] surgical procedure. A Pain Shunt will help you better focus your attention on the battlefield by allowing you to ignore painful stimuli*. This technology, the backboneof every Manei Domini operative, can be yours for no more than ¢4,000,000. Stop letting agony affect your performance on the battlefield! *Not guaranteed to ignore any pain endured from that lance mate who just won’t shut up WARNING! Pain Shunt surgery may cost up to ¢4,000,000. Our reps are not responsible if you do not have the funds to proceed with surgery. Avoid buying until you have a proper bankroll. DO NOT PURCHASE IF ONLY 1 PILOT REMAINS WITHOUT PAIN SHUNTS! Known side effects include clumsiness and may require extended physiotherapy
